Package model

Class AdminRole

java.lang.Object
model.abstracts.AEmployee
model.AdminRole
public class AdminRole extends model.abstracts.AEmployee
AdminRole class contains the methods to handle admin responsibility like performing administrative tasks and access sensitive system functionalities. This class extends the abstract base model class AEmployee.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminRole

      public AdminRole(String Name, String StaffID, String Role, String Gender, int Age, String Branch, String Password)
      The constructor for AdminRole class which takes in the Admin information which calls the base constructor of AEmployee class.
      Parameters:
      Name - The name of the staff.
      StaffID - The unique identifier of each employee in the Organisation.
      Role - The role the staff plays in the Organisation.
      Gender - The gender of the staff.
      Age - The number of years the employee has lived??
      Branch - The division the staff is working at.
      Password - The unqiue phrase or word to login to the system.

    • assignManagers

      public void assignManagers(String staffName, int branchToAssignTo)
      Assigns a manager to a specified branch if the branch has not reached its quota limit. If the specified staff member does not exist or is not a manager, no action is taken.
      Parameters:
      staffName -
      branchToAssignTo -
